title: Why was a 35 mph speed limit sign with current speed sensor installed in the Baxley sub-division? Most sub-divisions close by are 25 mph.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/07/why-was-a-35-mph-speed-limit-sign-with-current-speed-sensors-installed-in-the-bexley-subdivision/
